**[Dedispec, LLC. - Affordable Dedicated Servers | Colocation | Web Hosting](http://dedispec.com/blackfriday.php)**
<br>


**Our annual Black Friday begins at 12:00am CST on Friday (11/29). Enjoy deals across both Missouri and Texas locations on a number of popular services. The full list of offers can be found below, or here:** **[Black Friday Sale Page](http://dedispec.com/blackfriday.php)**
<br>
**All offers are valid Friday through Monday (11/29/2019 - 12/2/2019), or while supplies last. New orders only. Orders cannot be used to replace a service. Promotional pricing cannot be used to price match. Promotions will not be honored after 12/2/2019. Orders left unpaid after 24 hours will be closed.**
<br>
**Accepted Payment Methods: Credit/Debit Card, PayPal, Bitcoin**
<br><br>
